title: Testimonials
subtitles: Take a look at what my co-workers and clients say about me and my work.

testimonials.text: It's a pleasure to work with Leonardo. In addition to being committed and easy to deal with, he is an excellent developer, highly committed to the quality of what he produces. When faced with a challenge, he puts in the effort necessary to solve it and he is only satisfied with an adequate solution. I highly recommend him as a person and a professional.
